relationships.source: Michael Bowman Founding Board Chair, National Hemp Association and Chairman, Hemp for Victory Campaign Founding Director, “25x’25”
relationships.target: Soil stewardship is not a partisan issue. It is essential to our society. As we each cultivate our victory gardens, we will establish the kind of liberty and grounded democracy that our forebears envisioned for us.
relationships.evidence_text: “Soil stewardship is not a partisan issue. It is essential to our society. As we each cultivate our victory gardens, we will establish the kind of liberty and grounded democracy that our forebears envisioned for us. This Soil Stewardship Handbook is an excellent tool for us to engage with this critical mission and quest.” —Michael Bowman Founding Board Chair, National Hemp Association and Chairman, Hemp for Victory Campaign Founding Director, “25x’25”

evidence.source_surface: Michael Bowman Founding Board Chair, National Hemp Association and Chairman, Hemp for Victory Campaign Founding Director, “25x’25”
evidence.target_surface: Soil stewardship is not a partisan issue. It is essential to our society. As we each cultivate our victory gardens, we will establish the kind of liberty and grounded democracy that our forebears envisioned for us.

relationships.target: the embrace of soil as a climate solution in the Soil Stewardship Guild
relationships.evidence_text: “I'm delighted to see the embrace of soil as a climate solution in the Soil Stewardship Guild. This handbook provides a nicely explained overview of the science with an inclusion of several easy steps that people can take to realize a regenerative future. Thank you for this contribution.” —Seth Itzkan Co-founder, Co-director, Soil4Climate Inc.

evidence.target_surface: the embrace of soil as a climate solution in the Soil Stewardship Guild

relationships.target: the Soil Stewardship Handbook looks at our connections to the soil and the way that relationship can affect so many aspects of life.
relationships.evidence_text: “All life starts and ends with earth. The Soil Stewardship Handbook looks at our connections to the soil and the way that relationship can affect so many aspects of life. A cool resource and a creative perspective on a subject all too often not considered.” —Tanner Watt Director of Partnership and Development, REVERB

evidence.target_surface: the Soil Stewardship Handbook looks at our connections to the soil and the way that relationship can affect so many aspects of life.

relationships.target: the Soil Stewardship Handbook contains a plan for action on what and how we must all take action now to help nourish the soil
relationships.evidence_text: “The Soil Stewardship Handbook contains a plan for action on what and how we must all take action now to help nourish the soil that is so vital for the well being of humanity and health of our planet.” —Brigitte Mars Author, The Country Almanac of Home Remedies

evidence.target_surface: the Soil Stewardship Handbook contains a plan for action on what and how we must all take action now to help nourish the soil

relationships.target: Aaron Perry and his Y on Earth network have produced an informative handbook on soil stewardship
relationships.evidence_text: “Aaron Perry and his Y on Earth network have produced an informative handbook on soil stewardship that invites us to re-orient our lifestyle toward ecological justice, in simple but profound ways. Our spiritual flourishing is wedded to how we take care of the earth and all who inhabit it.” —Mark Bosco, S.J. Georgetown University

relationships.evidence_text: Aaron William Perry is a writer, public speaker, impact entrepreneur, consultant, artist and father. The author of Y on Earth: Get Smarter, Feel Better, Heal the Planet, Aaron works with the Y on Earth Community team and Impact Ambassadors to spread the THRIVING & SUSTAINABILITY messages of hopeful and empowering information and inspiration to diverse communities throughout the world.
